summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3155 for the improvement of North and West Fortieth Street, from Greenwood Avenue to Third Avenue Northwest; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 38510, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
